Package chess.logic.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
chess.logic.player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlackPlayer, WhitePlayer
public abstract class Player extends Object
Abstract class representing a player in the chess game.

      Calculates the attack moves on a specific square.
      Parameters:
      pieceCoord - The coordinate of the square.
      moves - Collection of moves to check.
      Returns:
